purpose: The email announces an open postdoctoral researcher position at the DistriNet research group at KU Leuven University in Belgium, focusing on Trustworthy Distributed Software Systems. It outlines the context of the research group, which is engaged in a strategic project on Blockchain and Local-first Software, and describes the role's requirements, including a PhD in Computer Science and a publication track record. The email also highlights the benefits of the position, such as a multicultural work environment and opportunities for research growth and collaboration.

evidence_sentences: The DistriNet research group at KU Leuven University in Belgium has an open position for a Post-doc researcher in Trustworthy Distributed Software Systems.
Our mission? To empower our industry partners with the knowledge and tools to create better, more scalable, and more secure and sovereign decentralized applications.
We are looking for a post-doc researcher with prior research experience and published results in the areas of Distributed Systems, Blockchain, Cloud or Web.
A full-time salaried position as post-doc researcher (fixed-term contract with the outlook for a multi-year engagement)
A workplace in a multicultural international environment at the KU Leuven High Tech Campus based in Leuven, Belgium with flexible working hours.
